question: Are more people today related to Genghis Khan than Julius Caesar?

This is because Genghis Khan and his descendants intermarried and had many children, spreading their genetic lineage across a vast territory. In contrast, Julius Caesar's direct descendants are believed to be relatively few, and his genetic legacy is not as widespread. So, yes, more people today are likely related to Genghis Khan than Julius Caesar.
